name: .BML File Extension
summary: Learn about .BML files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A BML file is a webpage written in the Bean Markup Language (BML). BML is based on the Bean Scripting Framework (BSF), which is a set of Java classes that provide scripting language support within Java applications.

content: BSF allows .JSP files to be written in languages other than Java, with access to the Java class library. BML files use BSF to process Java beans in event handlers and other embedded scripts.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
